title: Dihedrally Symmetric Monopoles and Affine Toda Equations
authors: H. W. Braden and Linden Disney-Hogg
abstract:
We show that any $SU(2)$ BPS monopole of charge $k$ with rotational spatial
dihedral symmetry is gauge equivalent to the Nahm data obtained from affine
Toda equations of $C_l^{(1)}$ type when $k=2l$ or $A_{2(l-1)}^{(2)}$ type when
$k=2l-1$.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
